Name: Bounce
Effect: Single Target. Charge Move. Out of Range while Charging. Vulnerable while charging to: Thunder / Twister / Sky Uppercut / Gust / Hurricane / Smack Down. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the Target.
Description: The Pok√©mon jumps at least 30 feet in the air before landing with a mighty stomp on top of the foe. While in the air it is safe from most treaths but its still vulnerable to bad weather.
